dt: {bc}a small Eurasian bird ({it}Delichon urbica{/it}) of the swallow family with a forked tail, bluish-black head and back, and white rump and underparts
{bc}any of various birds (especially genus {it}Progne{/it}) of the swallow family other than the Eurasian martin {dx}compare {dxt|purple martin||}{/dx}

shortdef: a small Eurasian bird (Delichon urbica) of the swallow family with a forked tail, bluish-black head and back, and white rump and underparts
any of various birds (especially genus Progne) of the swallow family other than the Eurasian martin

dt: {bc}a large swallow ({it}Progne subis{/it}) of North America the males of which have glossy purplish-blue plumage

shortdef: a large swallow (Progne subis) of North America the males of which have glossy purplish-blue plumage
Indian summer when occurring in November
